channel.title: Working on your server and script i dont need much help but plzz help
channel.description: Okay listen i have a server but i need to now how to edit your server to make the things it says when you die. You know how they say "You have died" well how do you change it. Also when you fish and milk cows and stuff or do what ever how do you make it give you different items. Last i need to know how to make the XP amount you gain when you hit dummys doors and exc..
